title: Mixed-Methods Research Application Project for Advancing Instructional Design Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and science education experience
context.additional_context: A program to enhance science field-specific instructional design competencies in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, involving collaborative problem-solving projects among learners.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the stages of instructional design expertise development and create a personalized development plan aligned with their career stage.
Learners can diagnose educational design issues in science fields and propose solutions using mixed research methodologies.
Learners can iteratively improve instructional design outputs by incorporating peer feedback in a project-based learning environment.

resources: Instructional design case studies in science disciplines
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
